Journal.Title: Neurological sciences : official journal of the Italian Neurological Society and of the Italian Society of Clinical Neurophysiology

Article.ArticleTitle: Myelin oligodendrocyte glycoprotein antibody-associated optic neuritis following third dose of BNT162b2 COVID-19 vaccine in a patient with systemic lupus erythematosus.
